sql.if: and (t.account_type like concat('%${searchVal}%') or t.account_time like concat ('%${searchVal}%') or t.total_pay like concat ('%${searchVal}%') or t.subject_id like concat ('%${searchVal}%') or t.description like concat ('%${searchVal}%') or t.remark like concat ('%${searchVal}%') or t.is_active like concat ('%${searchVal}%') or t.is_cash like concat ('%${searchVal}%') or t.cash_status like concat ('%${searchVal}%') or t.reason like concat ('%${searchVal}%') )

mapper.select: select id,title as text from t_cooperation_subject where company_id=#{companyId} and is_active=0
select id,name as text from t_cooperation_company where company_id=#{companyId} and hotel_id=#{hotelId} and is_active=0
select * from t_cooperation_accounts where id = #{id} and is_active=0

select t.*,(select nickname from t_user where t.hander=t_user.id) as hand,u.nickname,h.title,c.name,s.title as ctitle,cc.name as ccname from t_cooperation_accounts t,t_company c,t_hotel h,t_user u,t_cooperation_subject s,t_cooperation_company cc where t.hotel_id=h.id and t.company_id=c.id and t.shop_manager_id=u.id and t.subject_id=s.id and t.cooperation_company_id=cc.id and t.company_id=#{companyId} and t.hotel_id=#{hotelId} order by create_time desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
select * from t_cooperation_accounts where company_id=#{companyId} and hotel_id=#{hotelId}

select count(*) from t_cooperation_accounts t,t_company c,t_hotel h,t_user u,t_cooperation_subject s,t_cooperation_company cc where t.hotel_id=h.id and t.company_id=c.id and t.cooperation_company_id=cc.id and t.shop_manager_id=u.id and t.subject_id=s.id and t.company_id=#{companyId} and t.hotel_id=#{hotelId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_cooperation_accounts ( company_id, hotel_id, shop_manager_id, account_type, account_time, total_pay, subject_id, description, remark,cooperation_company_id, is_active, is_cash, cash_status, reason) values ( #{companyId}, #{hotelId}, #{shopManagerId}, #{accountType}, #{accountTime}, #{totalPay}, #{subjectId}, #{description}, #{remark},#{cooperationCompanyId}, #{isActive}, #{isCash}, #{cashStatus}, #{reason})
mapper.update: update t_cooperation_accounts set is_active=#{status} where id=#{id}
update t_cooperation_accounts set remark=#{remark} where id=#{id}
